thread.title: Natalie Neil

author: Natalie Neil
title: Natalie Neil
text: Love tails, great food, easy to use on the web updating our pups details , great delivery, delivered to our door each month by the fantastic delivery company Yodel but more importantly our dog Ted loves Tails he is a thriving pup and has an amazing glossy coat that everyone comments on. Highly recommend and do glad my friend recommended Tails.com to me when we got our new edition. Ted ğŸ¶ğŸ’™ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ŠXxxx
